meanings.sent1: The unexpectednesses of life keep things interesting.
meanings.sent2: I was taken aback by the unexpectednesses of the plot twist.
meanings.sent3: The unexpectednesses of the magician's tricks always amazed the audience.
meanings.sent4: The unexpectednesses of nature's beauty never fail to surprise me.
meanings.sent5: The unexpectednesses of the weather can make planning a challenge.

meanings.definition: Instances of events or situations that are not anticipated.
meanings.sent1: The unexpectednesses of the party made it more fun.
meanings.sent2: Dealing with unexpectednesses at work can be stressful.
meanings.sent3: The unexpectednesses of the prank left everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: The unexpectednesses of life's twists and turns can be exciting.
meanings.sent5: The unexpectednesses of the gift brought a smile to her face.
